content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" End-User Computing KB \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is the primary KB space with articles intended for our end-users. The contributors to the materials are members of a variety of groups and services members.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main audience for this KB space is the end-user, meaning any EPAMer.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The information in this KB is divided into logical sections for easy reference. A short description of each of the sections is presented below:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/twRDTQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EUS General Info\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". This Section provides general information regarding EUS. Here one may find key objectives of EUS, the main communication channels to use in case of any issues occurred. Also, in this Section, there is a list of EUS IT Heads and Deputies by country and region, and info on country peculiarities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/IwexDg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How-to and possible issues\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". The Section contains a variety of how-to and possible issues articles for end-users, referring to which one may find a solution to a problem.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/oghDTQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rEPAM Digital Workplace\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". This Section provides information on the Digital workplace at EPAM. Here, there is information on DaaS, as well as reference information on Apple Mac and Windows.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/oQdDTQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rEPAM Conference rooms and workplaces\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". In this Section, a list of conference rooms by location is presented, as well as the info on the hoteling system.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
